Text.Page: At Melsa's request, you paid a visit to Velik's Vigil in Freeholds.

[Rootstock]
The Freeholds are having the annual Rootstock festival, to harvest the last of the root vegetables and prepare for the spring planting.

In addition to farm-fresh food and drink, we have a number of fabulous attractions. Won't you please come to the fair?

Glad you could make it, ! Thank you for coming to Lein's Farm.

, I'm not sure what you remember of this place, but with your help, the Freeholds have recovered quite nicely, and we can finally hold Rootstock again!

We're all glad you came; everyone here is very grateful for your help.
